act_info.full_title: Vimy Ridge Day Act, 2010, S.O. 2010, c. 3
act_info.citation: Vimy Ridge Day Act, 2010, S.O. 2010, c. 3

content.content: 1. April 9 in each year is proclaimed as Vimy Ridge Day. 2010, c. 3, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. April 9 in each year is proclaimed as Vimy Ridge Day. 2010, c. 3, s. 1.

content.content: 2. All Canadian flags flown on the exterior of the Legislative Building and its adjoining premises shall be flown at half-mast on April 9 in each year. 2010, c. 3, s. 2. 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2010, c. 3, s. 3. 4. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2010, c. 3, s. 4. ______________ Français
content.raw_html:
2. All Canadian flags flown on the exterior of the Legislative Building and its adjoining premises shall be flown at half-mast on April 9 in each year. 2010, c. 3, s. 2.

3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2010, c. 3, s. 3.

4. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2010, c. 3, s. 4.

______________
